thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wuchan Zhongda's unit to sell pharma assets, in contact with partners on petrochemical JV

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wuchan Zhongda's unit to sell pharma assets, in contact with partners on petrochemical JV

organizations.name: reuters) - wuchan zhongda group co ltd

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Wuchan Zhongda Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS UNIT SIGNS AGREEMENT TO SELL PHARMA SUBSIDIARY TO NINGBO MENOVO PHARMACEUTICAL CO LTD
* SAYS UNIT IS STILL IN DISCUSSION WITH PARTNERS INCLUDING CEFC SHANGHAI INTERNATIONAL OVER SETTING UP PETROCHEMICAL JV Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2D4fuKN ; bit.ly/2HbfGKY Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
